name: Shixel Pmup
description:
You're trying to navigate your way over enemy airspace while they're throwing everything they've got at you, Can you survive? A new world and set of enemy formations are generated for every game, too bad you won't be able to enjoy the scenery below cuz you'll be too busy trying to survive! 

The world is generated at random, so weird occurrences like lamposts on a desert island, or a farm with no homes around it are not uncommon. Also, pay no mind to the occasional farm in the middle of a forest. Beware of the landmines, yes they still detect you and can blow you up even if you're miles above them.

The sprites are from Kenney's Pixel Shmup pack (The game's title makes a bit more sense now doesn't it? No? Okay...) All the sounds except the music are from the scratch Sounds library. The music is from Scratcher @Rae-TV's EDM album: Beyond. Found here https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/426798682/

Thanks to Emhuo https://emhuo.itch.io/ for their awesome Pixel font pack(s). I used Bold Blocks from the Nico Fonts pack in this project. Thanks to Kenney for hosting the Game jam, and thanks to YOU for viewing my project. Feedback would be greatly appreciated. Thank you!
